story.es: Soy un desarrollador web con mas de 5 a帽os de experiencia en el campo. He trabajado con diferentes tecnolog铆as como HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, JAVA, NODE JS, React, MySQL, Bootstrap, etc. Actualmente estoy impulsando Ideasoft, una idea que naci贸 en mi mente hace 5 a帽os y que ahora quiero hacer realidad. story.en: I am a web developer with more than 5 years of experience in the field. I have worked with different technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, JAVA, NODE JS, React, MySQL, Bootstrap, etc. I am currently driving Ideasoft, an idea that was born in my mind 5 years ago and that I now want to make a reality. I am passionate about technology and I am always looking for new challenges to improve my skills.
